outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
dataDirectory.comment: The base path for the directory to store saved files to improve performance by caching blockstats data.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorShapeOutline.comment: The color to use for outlining the blockstats image charts
colorShapeShadow.comment: The color to use for shadow of the blockstats image
colorGraphOutline.comment: The color to use for outlining charts and their labels
colorGraphValue.comment: The color to use for primary value in chart for fee rates
colorGraphAverage.comment: The color to use for the average line drawn across the fee rates chart
colorBands.comment: An array of colors to use for multi valued charts.
logStatsForRanges.comment: Indicates whether summary stats should be reported to log output
showStatsBlock.comment: Indicates whether the stats block image should be created
showFeeRates.comment: Indicates whether the fee rates image should be created
showSegwitPrevalence.comment: Indicates whether the segwit prevalence image should be created
